00020 /******************************************************************************/
00021 
00022 #ifndef VMI_PORTS_H
00023 #define VMI_PORTS_H
00024 
00025 #include "vmi/vmiTypes.h"
00026 #include "vmi/vmiTyperefs.h"
00027 #include "hostapi/impTypes.h"
00028 
00029 //
00030 // Bus-port types
00031 //
00032 typedef enum vmiBusPortTypeE {
00033     vmi_BP_MASTER,
00034     vmi_BP_SLAVE,
00035     vmi_BP_MASTER_SLAVE
00036 } vmiBusPortType;
00037 
00038 typedef enum vmiDomainTypeE {
00039     vmi_DOM_CODE,     // code domain port
00040     vmi_DOM_DATA,     // data domain port
00041     vmi_DOM_OTHER     // other domain port
00042 } vmiDomainType;
00043 
00044 typedef struct vmiBusPortS {
00045 
00046     const char      *name;
00047     vmiBusPortType   type;
00048     vmiDomainType    domainType;
00049     struct           {Uns8 min; Uns8 max; Uns8 unset;} addrBits;
00050     Bool             mustBeConnected;
00051 
00052     // space for documentation
00053     const char      *description;
00054     void            *descriptionDom;
00055 
00056     // domain is non-NULL if port is connected
00057     memDomainP       domain;
00058 
00059 } vmiBusPort;
00060 
00061 #define VMI_BUS_PORT_SPECS_FN(_NAME) vmiBusPortP _NAME ( \
00062     vmiProcessorP processor,    \
00063     vmiBusPortP   prev          \
00064 )
00065 
00066 typedef VMI_BUS_PORT_SPECS_FN((*vmiBusPortSpecsFn));
00067 
00068 #define VMI_END_BUS_PORTS {0}
00069 
00070 //
00071 // Get the memory domain (if any) from a bus port
00072 //
00073 inline static memDomainP vmirtGetBusPortDomain(
00074     vmiProcessorP processor,
00075     vmiBusPortP   busPort
00076 ) {
00077     return busPort->domain;
00078 }
00079 
00080 //
00081 // Net-port types
00082 //
00083 typedef enum vmiNetPortTypeE {
00084     vmi_NP_INPUT,
00085     vmi_NP_OUTPUT,
00086     vmi_NP_INOUT
00087 } vmiNetPortType;
00088 
00089 typedef struct vmiNetPortS {
00090 
00091     const char      *name;
00092     vmiNetPortType   type;
00093     void            *userData;
00094 
00095     // callback for input or I/O net change
00096     vmiNetChangeFn   netChangeCB;
00097     Uns32           *handle;
00098 
00099     // space for documentation
00100     const char      *description;
00101     void            *descriptionDom;
00102 
00103     Bool            mustBeConnected;
00104 
00105 } vmiNetPort;
00106 
00107 #define VMI_NET_PORT_SPECS_FN(_NAME) vmiNetPortP _NAME ( \
00108     vmiProcessorP processor,    \
00109     vmiNetPortP   prev          \
00110 )
00111 
00112 typedef VMI_NET_PORT_SPECS_FN((*vmiNetPortSpecsFn));
00113 
00114 #define VMI_END_NET_PORTS {0}
00115 
00116 
00117 //
00118 // Fifo-port types
00119 //
00120 typedef enum vmiFifoPortTypeE {
00121     vmi_FIFO_INPUT,
00122     vmi_FIFO_OUTPUT
00123 } vmiFifoPortType;
00124 
00125 typedef struct vmiFifoPortS {
00126 
00127     const char      *name;
00128     vmiFifoPortType  type;
00129     Uns32            bits;
00130     void           **handle;
00131     void            *userData;
00132 
00133     // space for documentation
00134     const char      *description;
00135     void            *descriptionDom;
00136 
00137 } vmiFifoPort;
00138 
00139 #define VMI_FIFO_PORT_SPECS_FN(_NAME) vmiFifoPortP _NAME ( \
00140     vmiProcessorP processor,    \
00141     vmiFifoPortP  prev          \
00142 )
00143 
00144 typedef VMI_FIFO_PORT_SPECS_FN((*vmiFifoPortSpecsFn));
00145 
00146 #define VMI_END_FIFO_PORTS {0}
00147 
00148 #endif
